description: Produce a media release and multimedia video about new research findings in developmental/social psychology. Includes critiquing AI-generated drafts (Part A), revising scripts (Part B), and creating a video (Part C). Involves feedback integration and science communication skills.

Weekly posts preparing for tutorials and practicing self-management skills. Includes 9 posts (Weeks 1-5,7-10) with tutorial prep exercises and participation activities related to study strategies, feedback integration, and content application. Bonus for timely completion.

Scheduled exam during exam period featuring multiple choice and short answer questions. Covers developmental psychology, social psychology, and First Nations content equally. Tests theoretical knowledge and real-world application.
